Claim: "No one and nothing experiences it directly"
Implication: "We all live in regions, not the globe"
Referring expressions: No one, nothing  We, regions, globe
Formula: (exists a (exists b (~IsExperiencedDirectly(a) and ~IsExperiencedDirectly(b)))) -> (exists e (exists c (IsInRegion(c) and ~IsInGlobe(e))))
